pullRequest.title: FLEX-3787 Remove metered functionality from the platform
pullRequest.bodyText:
Removes the metered boolean from DeviceModel, and removes the meter
type with short interval, long interval and long interval type from the
device configuration (setting and getting).

commit.message:
FLEX-3787 ~ Removes metered functionality from the platform

Removes the metered boolean from DeviceModel, and removes the meter
type with short interval, long interval and long interval type from the
device configuration (setting and getting).

+      | OSLP ELSTER | DALI                    | 2        | 1,1;2,2 |            |                   | 10.20.30.50   | 12123    |
+      | OSLP ELSTER |                         |          |         |            |                   | 10.20.30.50   | 12123    |

commit.message:
FLEX-3787 ~ Removes power usage functionality.

Removes get actual power usage and get power usage history functionaly from platform, test-suite and simulator.

FLEX-3787 ~ Removes no longer used class TimePeriod.

This class is based on a type in the OSLP protobuf specification, but no longer used. All classes which relate to it have been deleted.

FLEX-3787 ~ Removes obsolete property.

The property 'jms.get.power.usage.history.response.time.to.live' is no longer used and can be deleted.
